title: Kerba Program LINUX v1.1.2.1260
description:
Kerbal Space Program v1.1.2.1260 for linux.

Tested and working (with a little effort) on Kubuntu 14.04 x64.

If the game doesn't launch with just ./KSP.x86_64 then you can try with:
./KSP.x86_64 -force-gfx-direct

That works for me. Unfortunately that disables multithreading. Making it no better than v1.0.5.

If the world doesn't render with the gfx-direct option then you can try also adding -force-glcore.

For example. My full launch command is:
./KSP.x86_64 -screen-fullscreen 0 -screen-width 1920 -screen-height 1000 -force-glcore -force-gfx-direct

Torrent from
Many thanks to them for bringing us this release.

Screenshot: http://postimg.org/image/obkwarrup/
